entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Taloyoak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:59 AM MST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -37.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Taloyoak Airport 06:00 AM MST Tuesday 07 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -37.8°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 68 %

Dewpoint: -41.6°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 39. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 39. Wind chill near minus 55. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 41. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 20 km/h. Low minus 41. Wind chill near minus 57. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Tuesday 07 February 2023
